content: moonnaam shushroosha
(kukkiliyon ezhaam niram)

nee jeevanetuttheetumpol-haale... U haa...
Mrutharaayu mannil-cherunnu.

Kartthuyamahatthuvam vaazhattennum haale...U haa...
Than kriyakalilutayon-theliyatte.
baarekmor. Shubaho… menaolam…
(ekkbo)

priyanaam laasarine kabaree-
nnezhunnelppicchone vaazhtthaan vannituvin.
Mruthipaashatthinnum vidhavaa-
suthane vituvicchone naamellaaypozhum
vishramamenye thuthi cheythaaraadhikkenam.
sthaumenkaalos…
(altharae damdeenoso)

nagarakavaatam vazhiyaayu njaan-po-ku-
nne-ram ke-ttenoru naadam.
Shraddhicchen chennarike ni-nnettam
khedam tho-nnum ninadatthe.

Lalithakalebara tharunanmaa-reyum
baa-lanmaa-reyum kanden.
Prabhuvanithakalum daasikalum-santhaa-
paa-raava-tthil paatunnu.

Vyasanasametham chodicchen- ke-zhu-
nne-nthinne-vam sundarare!
Vyathayotenthinu paateetu-nne-nno-
to-thee “mooddaa mindaathe”

nee kaanunnoru saundaryam-paa-thaa-
la-tthi-l-paazhaayu poyeetum.
Ee rakthaambara ruchirathaye ee-yu-
llo-r than-bhooshaasubhagathaye.

Maranamashesham maayikkum-ee-sau-
ndaryam praa-thakaalatthil.
Thelivaakum sooryanu thulyam-ee-sau-
nda-ryam paazhpulkkotiyinmel

thangum thoomanjinu thulyam-ee-sau-
nda-ryam sa-ndhyaavelayathil.
Vaateetum poovinu thulyam-paa-thaa-
la-tthil paazhaam roopatthil.

Kaniyuka kaniyuka kartthaave! Jee-van
nal-ki the-jovasanam nee
athine aniyiccheetaname, sar-vvaa-
dhee-shaa sthothram, sthothram-the.
moriyo…
(kolo-thubykku eettho)

deveshaa! Nin parichaarika thannaathmatthe
sasamaadhaanam kykkolka
kanmashamakhilam mochikka
ivale vidhikkaruthe naathaa!
Nirmmaayan neeye-kan-thaan.
Aparaadhikalarhiccheetum
narakattheennival rakshithayaayu
kalpana kaatthavarotoppam
shobhana manavara poo-konam.
baarekmor. Shubaho …

haa mruthiye ni njeliyendaa mrutharaa-yor-mel
avarute mel thellilla nina-
kkadhikaaravumavakaashamathum
balavaanaam srashtaavavare
vistharanam cheyyum-noo-nam.
Saakshaalavakaashikalum thal
sutharum daasarumavarallo
nin kykalil ninnavare vee-
ndakum svarggamahaa-raa-jyam.
(kolo-thyhun olme)

anchi-taa maranatthe njaan
nidraabheethiyumi-llennil
dyvam-theeyil natattheetum
vidhiyortthancheetunnen njaan.
baarekmor. Shubaho ...

nee vaa-gdaanatthin naataayu
svarggamahatthuvam chaarttheetum
soonu-dhvani jeevan nalki
ninne valatthaayu che-rttheetum.
(madarosho-pardyso)

kaanthanu kaatthoraam-kanyaasthreekale nee
praapikkum sahaje!-punaruththaanatthil

vyaakula lokamithen-chinthaavishayamathaayu
aadimakaalatthe-kken maanasamoti
srushtiyeyortthoru njaan-vempi shaapatthaal
/tmruthyu nimittham verpiriyum naalvareyum
naarikalathyadhikam-vyathayil naalpokki
vedanayotu suthare -prasaviccheetunnu.

Jeevan poyppoyu ver-piriyum maathaave!
Nokkitumaathmajaril-netuveerppuyarunnu.
Thaayillaapparava-kkunjungalkkoppam
/tathisanthaapatthaal rodiccheetunnu
ee deenaaraavam-kelkkunnorellaam
khedatthaalavaro-toppam karayunnu.

Doothan chaare-va-nnennekkondiha poyu
maarakabaanatthaal-ennil bhramametti
nirddhayapeedakalaal-marddhicchamgangal
/tkaanmin, vati moonnaalenne thaadicchaan.
Njaanaashrayaheena-njaanayyo deena
nin srushtiye naathaa! Krupayaal puthuthaakka.
moriyo ...
(maar baalaayiyute bovuso)

karunaasampoornnaa! Punaruththaanadine
ninnute srushtiye nee-navamaakkeetenam.

Pathibandham mruthiyaal-veraayu meyu randaayu
ttheernnoru sahajaykkaay-praarththippin ningal.
Avaronnaakaname-punaruththaanatthil

mochikkuka paapam-maayikkuka dosham.
Sathyamezhum vidhiyin-naalil paatenam
parishuddhanmaaro-tthival nin sthuthi geetham.

Vannavanum varuvo-num mruthar thannuyirum
sthuthanennu shareeraa-thmaakkal paataname.
